items.summary: Update hero section headline to 'Global Growth. Strategic Power. Market Domination.' and subheadline to 'ROOT X GLOBAL Delivers Elite Marketing & Business Expansion Solutions.' Replace existing CTA button text with 'Schedule Executive Consultation' and 'Start Your Growth Journey'

Create new 'The Problem' slide section that displays 4 business pain points in bold luxury format: 'No consistent leads', 'Weak online presence', 'Poor branding visibility', 'No structured sales system'. Use minimal text with strong visual impact, gold accent markers, and glassmorphism card styling

Update services section title to 'Our Elite Solutions' and replace the 6 existing service cards with new services: 'Premium Website Development', 'High-Converting Social Media Ads', 'Cinematic Video Advertising', 'SEO & Brand Authority Building', 'Business Development Strategy', 'Sales Team & Insurance Advisory Structuring'. Maintain animated gold-outline cards with one-by-one appearance and soft gold glow effect

Update 'The Difference' section headline to 'Why Global Brands Trust Us' and replace existing bullet points with: 'Data-Driven Growth Strategy', 'Performance-Focused Execution', 'Premium Client Support', 'Local & Global Market Expertise', 'Result-Oriented Approach'. Maintain spacious and powerful layout

Update power statement section typography to display three separate lines: 'We Don't Just Build Businesses.', 'We Build Global Brands.' Add subtle animated gold light streak effect that moves across the screen horizontally

Update contact section headline to 'Let's Build Your Global Success Story' and change CTA button text to 'Book Private Strategy Call'. Maintain phone number 7557831531 and email www.rootxglobal@gmail.com in luxury gold bordered contact box with glowing effects

Update about section brand positioning statement to: 'ROOT X GLOBAL is an elite global growth and expansion partner delivering premium marketing, business development, and strategic sales solutions.' Adjust tone to reflect expanded service portfolio beyond logistics
Update primary matte black color from #0A0A0A to #0B0B0B throughout the design system to match the specified color code

Implement slide-style section transitions where each major section appears like a premium presentation slide with smooth entrance effects, ensuring each section feels like a distinct slide in a keynote presentation
